name: Do! It! Yourself!
description:
While attempting to escape a ‘Dantes Inferno’-esque world, Spirit - the recently deceased protagonist - is regularly encountering demons who constantly tell him to “do it yourself” when he asks for help out of Hell. Using the Bitsy game engine for the first time, the Do! It! Yourself! demo was made in two weeks as a university project.

This demo was created for educational purposes (MA in Game Design: Prototyping for Games) and a developer diary/journal can be found here.
